This unit is a squad of {0} 'Mechs.
This is a Squad unit. All members of a Squad Unit share the same internal systems, and these systems can not be damaged or critically hit. Squad units also don't track heat or instability.
For all weapons mounted on a squad unit that uses external ammunition, only ammunition boxes at the same location as the weapon can be used.
Allows a 'Mech Squad to carry a weapon larger than would be possible on an individual squad member.
